name: Canonical Body
description:
Welcome to the beginning of your transcendental experience with the first program of mystical introspection powered by technology. Thanks to its truly captivating module of systematic exaltation, you will be able to achieve a state of lucidity that will bring you closer to Providence. Your experience of reality will be enhanced in order to allow more meaningful connections with the cosmos. We are honored to guide you through this journey.

△◻❍

Type through a set of levels as your sanity dwindles away in this experimental typing game. In Canonical Body, you take the role of a newly-hired employee of GD-Beam Metatronics, a technology corporation who has just started a pioneering patient reinsertion program. Aided by Mr. Wrinkles, your recovery assistant, you will have to parse texts to contribute to the development of the company's next product: a new brain implant. To fulfill your tasks, you will also have to interact with the some elements around you. Will you follow Mr. Wrinkles' instructions or will you succumb to temptation?

The game features three different endings that depend on your choices.
